fact_summary: harold jenkins, a 75-year-old retired mechanic from charleston, south carolina, treasures solitude and moments of nostalgia
persona_summary: Meet Harold Jenkins, a 75-year-old Retired mechanic. They hail from Charleston, South Carolina. Harold Jenkins is passionate about solitude, nostalgia but has aversions to loud noises, tourists. In the game, Harold Jenkins's strategy is Backstabbing, reflecting their judgement which *tends* to be Prejudiced, cooperation which *tends* to be Resistant, outlook which *tends* to be Hopeful, initiative which *tends* to be Assertive, generosity which *tends* to be Selfish, social which *tends* to be Influential, mind which *tends* to be Balanced, openness which *tends* to be Narrow-minded and stress which *tends* to be Nervous.
description: A 75 year old Retired mechanic named Harold Jenkins
